enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding an option to the Options instance, with addRequiredOption ensuring the option is marked as required.
Both methods accept similar parameters for defining an option, with addRequiredOption additionally setting the option as required.
The assertion for addRequiredOption can be enhanced by verifying that the added option is present in the list of required options returned by getRequiredOptions.
After adding a required option, the test can verify that the option is recognized by the hasOption method, ensuring it is correctly added and recognized.
